item.description:
See Messages --> Cancellation Policy

Please be on time.

Once done with Sniffing Hello our four legged friends are pretty eager to get walking.
Delays usually mean tangled leashes games for their 2 legged friends .

Lots of parking available.... Hip Hip Hurrah!

Look for the red square in the map/picture in the following link
http://photos2.meetup...

Thank you Linda for sharing this wonderful setting with the group
item.how_to_find_us: The Parking Lot closest to the Boat House, by the boat ramp. Look for the green station wagon with NH eprint plates & a red Meetup Sign on the front windshield.
item.why: Dorris Pond has a nice wide trail all around, with lots of wilder-in forest trails to the sides. There are benches at scenic spots, boardwalks. A quick escape into nature in the middle of the city...

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Livingston Park - Manchester, NH
